title: Master Class In Cannabis Investing, Part 2
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Our Master Class returns with two terrific SA authors and investors in the cannabis space: James V. Baker and Julian Lin. We cover the US cannabis space and why P/E multiples don't make any sense; out of whack valuations. Coming soon: 100 bagger stocks; issuing debt vs selling stock. Cannabis investors need to be better educated. the absurdity of 280E. Covering the ETF MSOS, derivatives and options and a basket approach to cannabis investing. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
